articles.content: The Bondi Icebergs Club, a Sydney CBD food court and three more northern beaches venues are among those linked with a COVID-19 outbreak. SEE THE FULL LISTThe Bondi Icebergs Club, a Sydney CBD food co… [+3427 chars]
